tasks.task: Amass and transport manure using a tractor and plow.
subtasks: Start the tractor and engage the power take-off.
Attach the plow to the tractor.
Drive the tractor with the plow to the manure pile.
Operate the plow to scoop up manure.
Transport the plow with manure to the fields.
Select the appropriate cultivating attachment for the tractor.
Attach the cultivating equipment to the tractor.
Operate the tractor to move across the fields.
Adjust the cultivating depth and width as needed.
Descend from the tractor to approach the manure pile.
Grasp the manure and lift it onto the wagon.
Repeat the lifting and placement process until the wagon is full.

tasks.task: Drive the wagon to the field.
subtasks: Mount the tractor and退回 to the field location.
Operate the tractor to tow the wagon to the field.
Position the wagon close to the plowed field.
Distribute the manure from the wagon onto the plowed rows.
Level the manure spread on the soil surface.

tasks.task: Rotate the implement to ensure even distribution.
subtasks: Operate the plow or a similar implement to move the manure side to side.

tasks.task: Check the field for proper manure coverage.
subtasks: Walk through the field to visually inspect the manure application.
Ensure even coverage and absence of clumps.
Drive the tractor and wagon back to the storage area.
Unload any remaining manure and clean the equipment.
Return the implement to storage.
Park the tractor in the barn.
Disengage the power take-off and shut off the tractor.
Store the cultivating equipment safely.
Perform any needed maintenance on the tractor and equipment.
